author: julrach
content:
We think Matt's latest proposal represents a safe implementation of 7702 while leaving the design space open for innovation.

This proposal adds significant complexity and seems to serve a few vendors' use cases only. This proposal's solution to the shared storage problem has concerns of their own. Nonces are predicable and a malicious delegation can still target the entire storage space. The ability to brick an EOA seems like a non-starter.

7702 was originally proposed in a way that did not require new opcodes, this proposal is doing the thing we wanted to avoid.
